title: Print, "A plate from the set of twelve projects for engraved silver cups (12 Stick Zvm Ver Zaichnen Stechen ver Fertigt Bernhartzan Goldschmid Gesel Inn Niernberg)", 1580
medium: Punch engraving, pen and black ink, graphite on off-white laid paper
markings: Watermark: bear with collar and hanging tongue (horizontal)
inscribed:
At center above image in margin, in pen and black ink: 116
At center below image in margin, in graphite: 4
creditline: Museum purchase through gift of Mrs. John Innes Kane
description: Scrollwork frames a mask and clusters of flowers protrude from the sides at top. Below, two masks (a lion on the left and a man on the right) are presented above grapes and flowers.

participants.person_name: P. and D. Colnaghi and Co., Ltd.

tombstone.epitaph: Print, "A plate from the set of twelve projects for engraved silver cups (12 Stick Zvm Ver Zaichnen Stechen ver Fertigt Bernhartzan Goldschmid Gesel Inn Niernberg)", 1580.Punch engraving, pen and black ink, graphite on off-white laid paper. Museum purchase through gift of Mrs. John Innes Kane. 1942-36-11.
